title: ZZX-SBS
blurb: Site Builder System — generate unified project/portfolio/docs/downloads/papers pages from one manifest (GUI & CLI).
description: ZZX-SBS (Site Builder System) creates consistent page bundles across your site — projects/<kind>/<slug>/, portfolio, docs, downloads, and papers — from a single manifest. It supports themes (colors, fonts, layout templates), and runs both as a PyQt5 GUI and a scriptable CLI. This page includes a browser-only ‘mini builder’ so you can try the flow and download the generated files instantly.

versions.notes: Theme library hooks, multi-kind targets, portfolio/docs/downloads/papers writers.
Initial unified project page template + CLI/GUI skeleton.
